content: I've got a few large PRs coming up that characterize the Cantor Normal Forms of different operations on ordinals. The first PR in this sequence is mostly just a cleanup PR, simplifying some term mode sorcery and making results more readable.
Btw, I've got all the stuff I've proved so far on the https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/tree/vi.CNF branch.

I managed to prove the characterization of addition in an additive principal base yesterday! I'm now trying to show the characterizations of the natural operations, which has turned out to be surprisingly tricky...
(that initial PR is still open, btw)
@Mario Carneiro Sorry to bother, but could you take a look at this? There's a lot of stuff relating to the CNF I want to PR.
This PR has been in limbo for quite a while now.

@Violeta Hernández, you may need to identify particular people who have an interest in this subject, and ask them to review your work. (Mario is not a good pick, he's very busy with other things at present.)
